results.text: Endekwalen d. Nnan: "ih, d kunwi ay d imednas".
Sinna, bran i iqweôôa nnsen: "ni$ wigi, teéôiv, ur pmeslayen ara"!
Inna: "day tâabdem, war Öebbi, ayen ur kwen inefâan, ur kwen iîîuôôun, s wacemma?
Tfuh i kunwi, akked wayen tâabdem, war Öebbi! Day ur tefhimem ara"?
Nnan: "sseô$et ep, u sellket iôebbiten nnwen, ma tâazmem".
Nenna: "a times, ili d tasmuvi u d talwit, i Ibôahim".
Undin as p. Nerra ten d imexsuôen mavi.
